Text: Thanks, any chance of smaller SBS 3D version English language version, thanks again

this is a copy with CINAVIA protection, which means that on many blu-ray players, also on PS3, it will not play correctly, i.e. the sound will stop after about 20 minutes and a nice message pop up to get info at www.cinavia.com.......
i download it in iso form and can not be open waste of time and ratio,the file iso can not be extract not worth dowloading
The 3-d doesn't work but it does play in 2d ok...Although maybe the 3d doesn't work because I compressed it to a bd25 instead of a bd50?

@Sontiago
Because there's no such software that can re-encode 3D Blu-ray at the moment. If you compress it with BD Rebuilder/DVD Fab/etc.... it will become a 2D Blu-ray with AVC video.
